description: Once you upload a report, you will associate it with a participant. At that point, the participant, their providers, and their research coordinators will be able to view and download the report.Enter the ID of the participant associated with this report.

0.form_title: Enter the ID of the participant associated with this report.
0.input_helper_text: This number is on the top of the report
0.input_error: Please enter a valid Participant ID

error.title: This participant is not in the system
error.message: Please double check the Participant ID on the hard copy of the report and re-enter it above. If this problem persists, contact the system administrator.

error.title: Report failed to upload
error.message: We're sorry, something went wrong. Please remove the file and try to upload the report again.

success.title: Biomarker report uploaded successfully!
success.message: We sent an email to let the participant, their providers, and their research coordinator know.
